title: New technologies ‘no magic bullet’ to get voters of color to polls, study says (University ...
text: ( Source : University of California - Berkeley ) Voters of color are mobilized more by old-fashioned, door-to-door canvassing and phone bank calling than by new technologies, according to a new UC Berkeley study. Old-fashioned, door-to-door
